section.heading: Office of Human Rights; education efforts.
section.text: OHR shall develop courses of instruction and conduct ongoing public education efforts as necessary to inform employers, employees, employment agencies, and job applicants about their rights and responsibilities under this chapter.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 2282(b) of Fiscal Year 2018 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2017 (D.C. Act 22-104, July 20, 2017, 64 DCR 7032).
